mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FOLLOW ( FOLLOW_ID, FOLLOWER_ID, FOLLOWING_ID, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_FOLLOW.NEXTVAL, #{followerId}, #{followingId}, SYSDATE, #{createId}, SYSDATE, #{updatedId} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.FOLLOW_ID AS followId, f.FOLLOWER_ID AS followerId, f.FOLLOWING_ID AS followingId, u.USER_ID AS targetUserId, u.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, f.CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM TB_FOLLOW f JOIN TB_USER u ON f.FOLLOWER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE f.FOLLOWING_ID = #{followingId} ORDER BY f.CREATE_DATE DESC
